entry.title: [GRA1][Web Hosting] - Filerz942/Cluster028 incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 18, 08:34 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Web Hosting on Filerz942/Cluster028 has been resolved.

Start time : 18/09/2025 06:00 UTC
End time : 18/09/2025 08:16 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 18, 07:02 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Web Hosting offering, which is causing temporary availability issue for websites hosted on Filerz942.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 18/09/2025 06:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Websites hosted on Filerz942 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their websites hosted on Filerz942
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Start time : 17/09/2025 13:08 UTC
